email.subject: Welcome to RefrainedSystem
email.body:
Hello, It's good to have you along. When you booted this USB, you joined us. Feel free to copy this system over to a more permanent storage medium, if you are further interested.
There is a simple task for you, only an introduction to test your aptitude with the tool you've been given, it currently sits in the /bin/ directory of your system. Find your way into the system given, and we may have more work for you. The IP address of the server is attached below.
Learn to use this system and succeed, gaining glory as you rise with us. Failure to learn the system and fade into the monotonous life you previously lived.
